title: Social Security and COLA: What It Is & What It Means for Your Benefits
description: MarketWatch retirement editor Angela Moore and reporter Alessandra Malito discuss the cost-of-living adjustment in 2022, how it will affect Social Security benefits, what changes could be coming from Congress and what to watch out for next year.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: MarketWatch retirement editor Angela Moore and reporter Alessandra Malito discuss the cost-of-living adjustment in 2022, how it will affect Social Security benefits, what changes could be coming from Congress and what to watch out for next year.
